title: Python
content: If Javascript wasn't there, then it would be my favorite language; of course, it is also my first ever programming language.

title: Django
content: It is extremly handy, and organized, and Django is my preferred framework for e-commerce sites due to its advanced features.

title: JavaScript
content: JavaScript is my favorite programming language. I feel very comfortable when it comes to working with JavaScript.

title: TypeScript
content: Typescript is known as the drug for developers. Some legend says if you taste typescript once, you will never love other tastes.

title: NextJS
content: A Beautify creation by vercel "Next JS" is consider as best tool to write full-stack apps.

title: React
content: The creation of Facebook is  really excellent choice for writing frontend stuff; of course, I am talking about our all-time favorite library, React-js.

title: MongoDB
content: MongoDB is My favorite database because of its syntax and advanced features  which are similar to JavaScript.

title: HTML 5
content: I mostly use HTML for Hacking purpose  (Just kidding)ðŸ˜‰.

title: Scss / Sass
content: It's been a long time since I've unlocked the superpower of CSS, called SASS/SCSS, and it's just amazing.

title: Tailwind
content: A very beautiful micro-framework for writing fast styling. It boosts my speed 2X during styling.

title: Redux Toolkit
content: Redux Toolkit is a very beautiful library for state management. It helps a lot while dealing with complex states.
